column1: 24 Preamble of the Act reads as follows: WHEREAS it is the policy of the Government of Sri Lanka to provide for
the better protection of consumers through the regulation of trade and the prices of goods and services and to
WHEREAS  the  Government  of  Sri  Lanka  is  also  desirous  of  promoting  competitive  pricing  wherever  possible
and ensure healthy competition among traders and manufacturers of goods and services.
